tasks.label: Run
tasks.command: $proc = Get-Process -Name 'MMORPGEngine' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($proc) { Write-Host 'Terminating previous instance...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $proc | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 500 }; Write-Host 'Starting MMORPG Engine...' -ForegroundColor Green; .\build\bin\MMORPGEngine.exe; Write-Host 'Application exited' -ForegroundColor Yellow

tasks.label: Debug Run
tasks.command: $proc = Get-Process -Name 'MMORPGEngine' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($proc) { Write-Host 'Terminating previous instance...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $proc | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 500 }; Write-Host 'Starting MMORPG Engine Debug...' -ForegroundColor Green; .\build\bin\MMORPGEngine.exe; Write-Host 'Application exited' -ForegroundColor Yellow
